TopicTitle: orbital topographic map scanning (Besides ISA Mapsat)

Articles.Content:
A part in the VAB that would work similarly to the ISA mapsat mod, but would be official.

Maybe the creators of ISA mapsat could work with Squad, like C7 got to?

I'm on limited time. If any Squad member, or anyone affiliated with Squad read this,

then I would appreciate it extremely, because my voice has been heard.

A part in the VAB that would work similarly to the ISA mapsat mod, but would be official.

Maybe the creators of ISA mapsat could work with Squad, like C7 got to?

I'm on limited time. If any Squad member, or anyone affiliated with Squad read this,

then I would appreciate it extremely, because my voice has been heard.

I would really like this. Being able to map a planet or moon would be very useful for picking landing sites. Also could be a science part. We know it is possible because of the ISA Mapsat mod which sadly no longer works.
